CONTACT INDY FRESH CATERING

We’ll get back to you ASAP

Have a last-minute business luncheon or birthday party you need to cater? Or are you planning a wedding or conference way in advance? No problem! Our scrappy catering team works on your time. We’re flexible like that. You’ll hear back from us in a jiffy, too.

Talk to us now...


Email: info@indyfreshcatering.com
Phone: (317) 605-1200

Or Give Us the Deets Right Here…*

Thank you for inquiring with Indy Fresh Catering about your upcoming event! We would be happy to provide you with more information and a quote. Please tell us about your upcoming event by completing the form below and our catering manager will be in touch soon!

Thank you for choosing Indy Fresh Catering for your catering needs! Let's get your order started. Please provide us with some basic information about your event and our catering manager will be in touch to confirm your order. If your order needs to be delivered within the next 24 hours, please call our catering manager, Lisa, directly at (317) 605-1200.

Breakfast Wraps

Pre-rolled breakfast wraps come with a choice of bacon, Italian sausage or vegetarian fillings, as well as a variety of fruit and Danishes. Fruit or danishes can be swapped for Greek yogurt and organic granola for an extra $0.50/person.

Menu Selections
Breakfast Meats
French Toast Buffet

Custard dipped, home baked French toast, with choice of toppings. Also comes with choice of bacon or sausage.

Menu Selections
Toppings
Breakfast Meats
Pancake Buffet

Buttermilk pancakes served with maple syrup and your choice of the following toppings: sliced bananas, strawberries, blueberries, whip cream, or chocolate chips.

Menu Selections
Toppings
Breakfast Meats
All American Breakfast

Traditional scambled eggs, house potatoes, and choice of meat.

Menu Selections
Breakfast Meats
Signature Salad

Our Signature Salad with a variety of fresh toppings, including diced turkey or ham (add grilled chicken for $1/person), fresh baked Italian bread, and choice of dressings and drinks.

Menu Selections
Dressings
Skinny Box Lunch

Low-carb wrap, crudités with hummus and bottled water.

Menu Selections
Wraps
BBQ Lunch

House smoked, slow roasted, pulled pork or chicken, two Sides, JohnTom's BBQ Sauce and slider Buns. Includes Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

Menu Selections
Sides
Full Sized Box Lunch

Choose from Indy Fresh's distinctive full wraps or 6" subs and one side. Includes Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

Menu Selections
Subs & Wraps
Sides
Soup, Salad, Sandwich
(Choose 2)

Pick from our delicious soup, salad and sandwich options and one side. Includes Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

Menu Selections
Dressings
Soups
Subs & Wraps
Sides
Old School Box Lunch

Half wrap or 4” sub, chips or pasta salad, and Ghirardelli brownie.

Menu Selections
Subs & Wraps
Pasta & Sauces
Italian Lunch

Signature Side Salad, Pasta, one of our homemade sauces, and one entree. Includes fresh baked italian bread, Ghirardelli Brownies and Drinks.

Menu Selections
Dressings
Pastas & Sauces
Italian Entrees
Meat & Three Lunch

Choose one of our meat entrees and three of our homemade sides. Includes Ghirardelli brownies and drinks

Menu Selections
Italian Entrees
Sides
Italian Dinner

Dinner portions of our signature side salad, one appetizer, pasta, two of our homemade sauces, and two entrees. Includes fresh baked Italian bread, drinks, and a dessert option of either homemade bread pudding or brownies.

Menu Selections
Dressings
Pastas & Sauces
Italian Entrees
BBQ Dinner

Dinner portions of our house smoked and slow roasted pulled pork or chicken, one appetizer, two sides, JohnTom's BBQ sauce and slider buns. Includes Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

Menu Selections
Appetizers
Sides
Meat & 3

Dinner portions of our meat entrees (choose two), one appetizer, and three sides. Includes fresh-baked Italian bread, homemade Griradelli brownies, and drinks.

BREAKFAST

  • Breakfast Wrap

    Scrambled eggs, roasted potatoes, shredded cheese and red bell peppers wrapped in a flour tortilla. Your choice of bacon, Italian sausage or vegetarian.

  • French Toast Buffet

    Custard dipped, home baked Italian bread with your choice of the following toppings: bananas, strawberies, blueberries, whip cream, chocolate chips, homemade rum caramel.

  • Pancake Buffet

    Buttermilk pancakes served with maple syrup and your choice of the following toppings: sliced bananas, strawberries, blueberries or chocolate chips.

  • Gourmet Scrambled Eggs

    Spinach, goat cheese, choice of prosciutto or apple wood bacon, vine ripe tomatoes as toppings.

  • Traditional Scrambled Eggs

    Farm fresh eggs with Amish cream, salt, and fresh cracked pepper.

  • Fresh Danish Variety

    Fresh baked chocolate, apple and cinnamon danishes.

    15 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Fresh Baked Croissants

    Freshly-baked buttered croissants.

  • Greek Vanilla Yogurt & Organic Granola

    Vanilla yogurt with organic rolled oats, nuts and honey with a splash of brown sugar.

  • Fresh Seasonal Fruit Platter

    Platter of seasonal fruit consisting of melons, pineapples, strawberries, etc.

  • 100% Fresh Florida Orange Juice

    Fresh Florida orange juice served by the gallon.

  • 100% Colombian Dark Roast Coffee

    Colombian dark roast coffee served in 8oz cups. Comes with cups, stirrers, creamers, and sweeteners.

BREAKFAST MEATS

  • Bacon

  • Italian Sausage


BREAKFAST TOPPINGS

  • Fresh Fruit

  • Chocolate Chips

  • Homemade Rum Caramel

APPETIZERS

  • Pinwheel Platter

    Ham, turkey, cheddar cheese, mixed greens, tomatoes, and garlic aioli.

  • Baked Goat Cheese

    Herb rolled Amish goat cheese over our homemade tomato garden and herb sauce with garlic crostini.

  • Caprese Salad

    Mixed greens, diced vine ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, balsamic vinaigrette.

  • Caprese Skewers

    Fresh mozzarella, tomato, basil infused olive oil, balsamic reduction over mixed greens.

  • Bacon Wrapped Meatballs

    Our large sirloin and parmesan herb meatballs wrapped in applewood bacon and slow roasted to perfection.

  • Classic Meatballs

    Hand rolled meatballs rolled with Italian sausage, fresh herbs and parmesan cheese. Slow roasted in our homemade tomato garden and herb sauce.

  • Asian Chicken Skewers

    Marinated and grilled chicken, with sesame Asian glaze.

PLATTERS

  • Crudités w/ Hummus

    Garden fresh vegetables, imported olives, house pickled vegetables, hot peppers. Comes with choice of either garlic or roasted red pepper hummus and home made blue cheese dressing.

  • Domestic Cheese Platter

    Amish Bleu Cheese, ripened Brie, Wisconsin Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, aged Swiss, Cranberry Goat Cheese, fresh berries, and dried figs.

  • Imported Cheese
    Platter

    French Ripened Brie, Danish Bleu, English Cheddar, Fontina, Spanish Manchego.

  • Seasonal Fruit Platter

    Served with flavored Greek yogurt.

BBQ

  • Midwest Sourced Pulled Pork

    House rubbed, slow roasted and smoked pork, with JohnTom’s award winning BBQ sauce.

  • Quartered Chicken

    Miller's Amish Chicken, house smoked and slow roasted whole chicken cut and quartered.

  • Amish Pulled Chicken

    Miller's Amish Chicken, house rubbed, slow roasted and smoked, with JohnTom’s local award winning BBQ sauce.

  • Sausage Links

    Slow roasted, spicy sausage with caramelized onions served on a fresh baked bun.

  • Fresh Smoked Ham

    Need 24 hours before expected delivery. Smithfield all natural cured smoked ham sliced with pineapple and sweet cherry glaze.

  • Fresh Smoked Pork Loin

    Need 24 hours before expected delivery. Smithfield all natural pork loin, slow roasted, paired with with peppercorn demi-glaze.

SOUPS

All soups come with homemade bread and whipped butter.

  • Roasted Red Pepper Tomato Bisque

    Tomato bisque with garden roasted vegetables, sweet Amish cream, and fresh herbs.

  • 3 Bean & Ground Sirloin Chili

    Chic peas, red and white beans, cilantro, sweet bell peppers, chili peppers, lemon herb dressing over mixed baby greens.

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice

    Wild rice, garden vegetables, with a pinch of cayenne.

  • Sausage & Lentil

    Fresh vegetables, organic green lentils, Italian sausage, and fresh herbs.

  • Brunswick Stew

    Hearty Southern Favorite! Pork Shoulder, Ground Sirloin, fresh vegetables and spices that will make every man weak in the knees.

  • Chicken Noodle Soup

    Traditional creamy chicken noodle soup using fresh vegetables and Amish chicken.

SALADS

  • Signature Salad

    Romaine lettuce and baby greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, red and yellow peppers, parmesan cheese, fresh garlic croutons, and choice of dressing. Add deli smoked chicken, ham, or turkey for $1.00 per person.

  • Baby Spinach Salad

    Baby spinach and baby greens, roasted red peppers, fresh berries, vine ripe tomatoes, toasted walnuts, goat cheese, sundried tomato vinaigrette.

  • Caprese Salad

    Mixed greens, diced vine ripe tomatoes, diced fresh mozzarella, sliced strawberries, balsamic vinaigrette.

  • Asian Chicken Salad

    Marinated grilled chicken, mixed greens, carrots, cilantro slaw, cashews, sesame dressing.

  • 3 Bean Salad & Baby Greens

    Chic peas, red and white beans, cilantro, sweet bell peppers, chili peppers, lemon herb dressing over mixed baby greens.

SANDWICHES & WRAPS

  • Classic Italian

    Midwestern brown sugar ham, salami and pepperoni with mixed greens, vine ripe tomato, yellow onion, lemon herb dressing on fresh baked Italian grinder bread.

  • Turkey Avocado

    Oven roasted turkey, vine ripe tomatoes, red onion, fresh mozzarella, mixed greens, roasted garlic aioli.

  • Turkey Club

    Oven roasted turkey, applewood bacon, mixed greens, vine ripe tomatoes, roasted garlic aioli.

  • Turkey & Ham

    Oven roasted turkey, brown sugar ham, mixed greens, provolone, lemon herb dressing.

  • Chicken Chipotle

    Marinated roasted chicken breast, baby greens, chipotle aioli, red onion, parmesan cheese.

  • Chicken Bacon Ranch

    Marinated roasted chicken breast, baby greens, applewood bacon, cheddar and ranch.

  • Chicken Caesar

    Marinated roasted chicken breast, crisp romaine hearts, classic Caesar dressing, parmesan.

  • Veggie & Herb

    Grilled yellow squash, zucchini, red peppers and portobello mushrooms, fresh mozzarella, mixed baby greens, balsamic dressing.

Gluten free wraps available unpon request.

SANDWICHES & WRAPS

  • Classic Italian

    Midwestern brown sugar ham, salami and pepperoni with mixed greens, vine ripe tomato, yellow onion, lemon herb dressing on fresh baked Italian grinder bread.

  • Authentic Italian

    Thinly sliced Maestro Italian Prosciutto di Parma with aged sliced provolone, mixed baby greens, virgin olive oil and herb seasoning, served on fresh baked Italian bread. Add $1.00 per person.

  • Turkey Avocado

  • Hummus Wrap

    Spinach wrap with homemade garlic hummus, vine ripe tomatoes, red onion, fetta cheese, and mixed greens topped with a lemon herb dressing

Gluten free wraps available unpon request.

INDY FRESH MEMORABLE SIDES

  • 3 Bean Salad

    Garbanzo, black and kidney beans, sweet bell peppers, yellow onions, vine ripe tomatoes, cilantro in lemon herb dressing.

  • Pesto Penne

    Fresh basil pesto, mixed greens, olive oil, fresh penne.

  • Pasta Salad

    Tri-color rotini pasta, fresh mozzarella, sweet bell peppers, and Bermuda onion, mixed greens, lemon herb dressing.

  • Potato Chips

    A variety of kettle cooked chips.

  • German Potato Salad

    Yukon gold potatoes, boiled eggs, celery and onion, in creamy German mustard dressing.

  • Cucumber Tomato
    Salad

    Marinated vine ripe tomatoes, garden fresh cucumbers, Bermuda onions, feta cheese, and lemon herb dressing.

  • Creamy Coleslaw

    Fresh shredded cabbage, cilantro, green onion, creamy German mustard dressing.

DESSERTS

  • Ghirardelli Brownies

SAUCES

  • Garden Tomato

    Roasted garden vegetables, fresh herbs and Italian plum tomatoes.

  • Vodka Cream

    Garden tomato sauce with reduced organic vodka and cream.

  • Lemon Caper

    Roasted garlic cream sauce with reduced fresh lemon, white wine and capers.

  • Roasted Garlic Cream

    Slow roasted garlic and shallots with wine and cream.

DRESSINGS

  • Lemon Herb Vinaigrette

    Classic Asian vinaigrette with toasted sesame and peanuts.

  • Balsamic Vinaigrette

    Aged balsamic vinegar, imported olive oil, roasted garlic.

LASAGNA & ZITI

  • Baked Ziti

    Ziti pasta with garden tomato red sauce, ricotta and whole milk mozzarella cheese and Italian sausage. Served by the pan.

  • Classic Lasagna

    Meat sauce, ricotta and whole milk mozzarella cheese, aged parmesan, with Italian pasta. Served by the pan.

  • 3 Cheese Lasagna

    Our meatless version of our classic lasagna. Served by the pan.

  • Eggplant Lasagna

    Layers of fresh eggplant, roasted peppers, added to our 3 cheese lasagna. Served by the pan.
